item.title: Servo Testing/Control Board
item.description: [View Code on Github](https://github.com/rhovious/servoTester Servo Testing/Control Board) Building a simple board that will allow moving of a 180* servo via a potentometer and 1306 screen. About This project serves the purpose of building a small servo control device. This device allows connection of a standard 180* rotation servo. The angle of the servois adjusted using the potentometer. The active angle of the servo is displayed on the connected screen Hardware Required Arduino Board Any arduino should work, using a Nano clone Servo Motor 0.

item.title: Wedding Countdown with Magtag
item.description: Wedding Countdown with Magtag Countdown to an event using the Adafruit Magtag. [View Code on Github](https://github.com/rhovious/WeddingCountdown Wedding Countdown with Magtag) About A quick python script that I used to create a countdown to my wedding using the Adafruit Magtag. This can also be used as a generic countdown to any event. Hardware Required Adafruit Magtag Another CircuitPython board should work, but would require modification of the e-ink code. 1S Lipo (Optional, for power) Assembly Install into 3D printed case (Optional) Install liPo battery (Optional) Programming Knob Circuit This project is based off of ADAfruit’s christmas countdown for the Magtag.
